basics.name: Lakshmi Julakanti

basics.summary: I am studying for a Master of Science in Computer Science in the Department of Computer Sciences at the University of  Central Missori. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2024.

highlights: Creation and maintenance of optimum data pipeline architecture for ingestion, processing of data
Work in sync with internal and external team members like data architects, data scientists, data analysts to handle all sorts of technical issues
Data processing with newer tools that help in data management from disparate sources
Integration of data management processes into the organizationâ€™s current structure

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
